item.title: Piramal Pharma Ltd Stock Hits 52-Week Low Amidst Continued Downtrend

item.title: Aadhar Housing Finance Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: Aadhar Housing Finance Ltd has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average, signalling a potential shift towards a bearish trend. This development suggests a deterioration in the stock’s momentum and raises concerns about its medium to long-term price trajectory amid mixed fundamental and technical signals. Time: 7 minutes ago
